Posts.Content: canadianhockeymom wrote: I had my mammogram 2 weeks ago and they saw a 7mm spiculated mass .  I went for my core biopsy todday and this new doctor said there are 2 masses?  One they called 1 o'clock and the other 2 o'clock. Does this mean its not just invasive but now metastic? I'm freaking out - anyone with experience with two tumor sites? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Freaking out -Biopsy Question? canadianhockeymom Ariom
